name: BananaHunt
description:
Banana Hunt, premier projet des macaques en rut !

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.BananaHunt.BananaHunt&hl=en_US...

Immerse yourself in the adventure of Banana Hunt, through a gorilla that searches for the farmer through different paintings. Banana Hunt is a fun game, and made with fun!

The offbeat universe will make you forget the problems of everyday life, to bring you closer to your animality 🐵.

Made with ♥ on our own and our own designs.
